item.name: Get Specific User By SF Id
Get Project Roles By User Id
Get Project Roles By Project Id

graphql.query:
{
  trainingSessionsByProject(sf_project_id: "a0EOj0000001h1JMAQ") {
    message
    status
    trainingSessions {
      ts_id
      ts_name
      ts_module
      ts_group
      tns_id
      farmer_trainer
      ts_status
      total_males
      total_females
      has_image
      is_verified
      validation_status
      session_date
    }
  }
}
